Product Description

Compatibility List:

Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra 5G, S22 Plus 5G, S22 5G, S21 Ultra 5G, S21 Plus 5G, S21 FE, S21 5G, S20 Ultra 5G, S20 Plus 5G, S20 5G, S20 FE

Samsung Galaxy S10, S10 Plus, S10e, S9, S9 Plus, S9 Active, S8, S8+, S8 Active

Samsung Galaxy Note 20 Ultra 5G, Note 20 5G, Note 10 Plus 5G, Note 10, Note 9, Note 8

Samsung Galaxy A02s, A03s, A03, A3, A5, A6, A7, A8, A9, A10, A10E, A11, A12

Samsung Galaxy A20, A21, A21s, A22, A31, A32, A40, A41, A42, A50, A51, A52, A53, A60, A70, A70s, A71 5G, A72, A80, A90

Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 2/ Z Fold 3/ Z Fold 4/ Z Flip/ Z Flip 3/ Z Flip 4/ F52

Samsung Galaxy Tab A 8.0(2018), Tab A 10.1 (2019), Tab 10.5, Tab A 8.0

Google Pixel, Pixel 2, Pixel 3, Pixel XL

LG G5, G6, G7, V20, V30 ThinQ Plus

One Plus, HTC, ZTE Axon, Nexus 6p

Other USB Type C Device

INPUT:

100 – 240 VAC ; 50-60HZ 0.50A

OUTPUT

9V/1.67A ; 5V/2.00A

What is Adaptive Fast Charging

This technology allows the smartphone to be charged with a faster speed, battery can charge faster up to 75% .

Will this product charge other Android phones quickly?

Yes. As long as your device supports Quick Charge QC2.0 & QC3.0, our wall charger block with Type-C cable will charge your device at a fast manner.

What is the difference between Quick Charge (QC) and Adaptive Fast charging (ADC)?

They are basically the same technology but brands marketed in different name. While Qualcomm named it Quick Charge, Samsung named it Adaptive Fast Charging.

Safe Fast Charger & Sync

Fast charger delivers up to output current of 15W, 75% faster than standard chargers, it also has the sync feature, most importantly, it is made for safe charging, it can intelligently recognize the battery type and status, will automatically stop charging when fully charged to prevent from short circuit, over-current, over-voltage, over-heating and over-charging.

Perfect for Any Occasions

These fasting charging kit is great for home, office, restaurant, tour, hotel etc.

High Quality ABS Material

Made of ABS material for the charger shell, shockproof and protect from over-heating & short-circuit

Easy to Carry

Compact classic design is portable to carry anywhere, slim and lightweight

【Quick Charge 3.0 Rapid Charging】Adaptive type c fast charger, enables your battery from zero to 50% in just 30 minutes, 75% faster than standard chargers.
【Fast & Sync】 USB c cell phone wall charger kit charges Samsung phones and tablets with USB 2. 0 ports at max high speed of 480 Mbps. It also charge USB-C devices without the Fast Charging feature as well, with up to a 2 Amp charging rate. Besides, it also has data transfer feature for convenient usage.
【Wide Compatibility】Compatible AFC (Adaptive Fast Charging): Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra, S21 Plus, S21, S20 Ultra, S20 Plus, S20, S20 FE, S10, S10e, S10+, S9, S9+, S9 Active, S8, S8+, S8 Active, Galaxy Note 20 Ultra , Note 20 5G, Note 10+ 5G, Note 10, Note 9, Note 8, Galaxy A90, A80, A71 5G, A70s, A52, A51, A20, Galaxy Z Fold2, Z Fold2 5G, Z Flip, Z Flip 5G, Fold, GOOGLE Pixel 1, 2, 3, 6, Pixel XL, LG G5, G6, G7, V20, V30 ThinQ Plus, One Plus, HTC, ZTE Axon, Nexus 6p and other USB Type C Device
【Package List】Replace or refund within one year without return, lifetime technical support. Package included: 2x Wall Charger Plug Box Brick and 2x Type-C [ 6 Feet ] Cord.

Compatibility List:

Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra 5G, S22 Plus 5G, S22 5G, S21 Ultra 5G, S21 Plus 5G, S21 FE, S21 5G, S20 Ultra 5G, S20 Plus 5G, S20 5G, S20 FE

[2022 Upgraded Newest Version] It is the first one within the market that adapts the aviation material “PTFE”. With the metal vent clip [stronger & tighter]. Screw the clamp and the rubber clip hook will catch one of the car air vent blades tightly, even if you hit a bump or a sharper turn. So this vent phone holder could work well for you in extremely Driving environments. – Never Broke & Super Stable
[One Handed Operation & Drive without Distracting] Andobil design engineers upgraded the switch button, which not only made it easier to press it, but also made it quick to open the arm for only 0.1S. Mount or remove your phone in seconds with the patented Easy Clamp. – Easy to Use
[Easy to Adjust & Multiple Viewing Angle] This car mount for phone has a highly flexible ball-joint 360° rotation that provides infinite viewing angles. The phone car mount allows quick switching between vertically and landscape view .Position your phone at the perfect angle to enjoy a more relaxed and safer drive. – Best Driving Angle
[Adjustable Foot Design, Universal Compatibility ] – Andobil product manager designed adjustable foot of car phone holders. Avoid some cell phone power or volume button will be squeezed by the clamp arm. Meanwhile, the adjust foot improve the compatibility making this car cell phone holder fit for all smartphones. BTW, You don’t need to remove your thick case while using this phone holder car. – Big Phones & Thick Case Friendly
[Andobil Worry-Free Vouchsafing] – ANDOBIL vent phone holder for car always provide 24-month of worranty-support. – 12 hours quick response service

(as of Nov 30,2022 06:10:08 UTC – Details)


Samsung Galaxy A22 5G mobile was launched on 2nd June 2021. The phone comes with a 6.60-inch touchscreen display. Samsung Galaxy A22 5G is powered by an octa-core processor. It comes with 4GB of RAM. The Samsung Galaxy A22 5G runs Android 11 and is powered by a 5000mAh battery. The Samsung Galaxy A22 5G supports proprietary fast charging. As far as the cameras are concerned, the Samsung Galaxy A22 5G on the rear packs a triple camera setup featuring a 48-megapixel primary camera with an f/1.8 aperture; a 5-megapixel camera with an f/2.2 aperture; a 2-megapixel camera, and a 2-megapixel camera with an f/2.4 aperture. The rear camera setup has autofocus. It has a single front camera setup for selfies, featuring an 8-megapixel sensor with an f/2.0 aperture. The Samsung Galaxy A22 5G runs One UI Core 3.1 is based on Android 11 and packs 64GB of inbuilt storage (up to 1000GB). The Samsung Galaxy A22 5G is a dual-SIM (GSM) mobile that accepts Nano-SIM mobile. The Samsung Galaxy A22 5G measures 167.20 x 76.40 x 9.00mm (height x width x thickness) and weighs 203.00 grams. It was launched in Grey, Mint, and Violet color. Connectivity options on the Samsung Galaxy A22 5G include Wi-Fi, GPS, USB Type-C, 3G, and 4G (with support for Band 40 used by some LTE networks in India). Sensors on the phone include accelerometer, ambient light sensor, proximity sensor, and fingerprint sensor.
128GB ROM, 4GB RAM, Expandable MicroSD, MediaTek MT6833 Dimensity 700 5G (7 nm), Octa-core, Mali-G57 MC2
Dual-SIM (GSM) mobile that accepts Nano-SIM mobile. Rear Camera: 48MP, F1.8 + 5MP, F2.2 + 2MP, F2.4 (depth), Front Camera: 8MP, F2.0
2G Bands: 850, 900, 1800, 1900MHz, 3G Bands: 850, 900, 1700, 1900, 4G LTE Bands: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 7, 8, 12, 17, 20, 26, 28, 38, 40, 41 , 66
5G Bands: N1(2100), N3(1800), N5(850), N7(2600), N8(900), N20(800), N28(700), N66(AWS-3) N38(2600), N40(2300), N41(2500), N78(3500). May not get 5G as it is not available in all regions. Please check with your carrier for compatible 5G Bands.
International Model compatible with Most GSM Carriers in US and Global like T-Mobile, AT&T, MetroPCS, etc. Will NOT work with CDMA Carriers Such as Verizon, Sprint.

4
Price: $239.99 - $181.69
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:10:08 UTC – Details)

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;

offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,

This pre-owned or refurbished product has been professionally inspected and tested to work and look like new. How a product becomes part of Amazon Renewed, your destination for pre-owned, refurbished products: A customer buys a new product and returns it or trades it in for a newer or different model. That product is inspected and tested to work and look like new by Amazon-qualified suppliers. Then, the product is sold as an Amazon Renewed product on Amazon. If not satisfied with the purchase, renewed products are eligible for replacement or refund under the Amazon Renewed Guarantee.

Price: $212.95 - $214.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:14:33 UTC – Details)


As the Galaxy S10, the Samsung Galaxy S10+ comes with a powerful Snapdragon 855 chip, a glass-and-metal construction, and a fingerprint reader built inside the display. It is bigger, however, meaning that you get a larger, 6.4-inch OLED screen and a larger, 4100mAh battery lasting longer between charges. The phone can be had with up to 1TB of built-in storage and 12GB of RAM. The camera system is identical, combining a main, 12MP camera with dual aperture, with a 2x zoom telephoto camera and a super wide-angle cam for epic shots. On the front, the curved display stretches from one edge to another, interrupted only by an oval cutout for the 10MP dual front-facing camera with autofocus and 4K video recording.
Tested for battery health and guaranteed to have a minimum battery capacity of 80%.
Successfully passed a full diagnostic test which ensures like-new functionality and removal of any prior-user personal information.
The device does not come with headphones or a SIM card. It includes either a generic or original charger and charging cable.
Inspected and guaranteed to have minimal cosmetic damage, which is not noticeable when the device is held at arm’s length.

4.5
Price: $212.95 - $214.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:14:33 UTC – Details)

Expand your view to the 6.5-inch Infinity-V Display of Galaxy A02s and see how less screen delivers more view. Thanks to HD+ technology, your everyday content looks its best—sharp, crisp and clear. Galaxy A02s combines streamlined design aesthetics with classic colors. Refined curves make it comfortable to hold and provides easy screen navigation. Snap memorable moments in clear detail with the 13MP Main Camera. Customize focus with Depth Camera, or get closer to the details with Macro Camera. If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Price: $29.99 - $22.49
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:06:55 UTC – Details)


Finding the important things in your life. Bluetooth powered SmartTags attach easily to keys, bags, or even the family pet. If you think your lost item is nearby but can’t quite find it, tap the ring button on your mobile and follow the familiar sound of your ringtone calling for you at the volume you set. Your tagged item is out of range? No problem! Even when offline, the Galaxy Find Network can use scanned data to find it for you privately. And it’s easy to scroll through a history of where the tag’s been to retrace it. You can also use other devices you own to locate your items.
Find it: If you lost your stuff, just launch the app, and see where it’s been last. Retracing your steps is easy.
Take it easy: There it is. Thanks to Galaxy SmartTags, finding lost items is smart and simple.
Use with a Galaxy smartphone running Android 8.0 or higher and RAM 2.0GB above. SmartThings app required.

More display means more room to play: Expand your view to the 6.5-inch Infinity-V Display of Galaxy A12 Nacho and see what you’ve been missing. Thanks to HD+ technology, your everyday content looks sharp, crisp and clear. Upgrade your mobile photography with Quad Camera: Snap memorable moments in clear detail with the 48MP Main Camera. Expand the viewing angle with Ultra Wide Camera. Customize focus with Depth Camera, or get closer to the details with Macro Camera. Power that keeps you going: Stay ahead of the day with a battery that won’t slow you down. The 5,000mAh (typical) battery lets you keep doing what you do, for hours on end. And with up to 15W of Adaptive Fast Charging, Galaxy A12 Nacho quickly gets back to full power. Give yourself more room to play: Galaxy A12 Nacho combines Octa-core processing power with up to 4GB of RAM for fast and efficient performance for the task at hand. Enjoy 128GB of internal storage.
128GB ROM, 4GB RAM, Exynos 850 (8nm), Octa-core (4×2.0 GHz Cortex-A55 & 4×2.0 GHz Cortex-A55), Mali-G52, Android 11, One UI 3.1
Rear Camera: 48MP, F2.0 + 5MP, F2.2 + 2MP, F2.4 + 2MP, F2.4, Front Camera: 8MP, F2.2, Bluetooth 5.0
